ADVENT.Message: Count Cristo's been CURSED! There's one way for him to flee! Find it, and he'll go FREE!
Spirit vibrations drive me from room.
Prints too small for the unaided eye.
For a reading just `SUMMON MEDIUM MAEGEN` today!!
Phosphorescent letters are very hard to read in bright light!
Amongst the GRAVES is a four leaf clover.
One of the test tubes EXPLODED!
Safe's combination lock is numbered from 33 to 38.
Ring glows briefly and door vanishes
A beam of light shines on grave
Ju-Ju man says:'My bag is now yours! Its magic will help you -CRACK- the curse!'.
HURRAH! Look who is in the room!
It's much to heavy to LIFT!
You startled medium and she vanished
Maid chased me with broom for tracking soot through the Ball- room. I wonder where I am?
Sweep pops out, thanks me, hands me a piece of paper then vanishes!
As I dust of the Idol it begins to glow!
Doll looks like Count Cristo. There're pins in it!
Bird says: 'ask for ADVENTURE 5, -THE COUNT- at your favorite computer dealer. It will be LOVE AT FIRST BYTE!'
I see a hole under it!
Nails were rusted but I got them out.
It's hArd work but it seems to be coming loose
I hear strange sounds, as if someone were moaning.
Heavy duty exhaust fan comes on and sucks me up!
says: `SAY ZAP to restore someone changed to stone!`
I'll need something to pry it off the wall!
It's a book on removing curses. Says: 'With knife in hand you take a stand. Circle coffin and...' The rest of the page is missing!!!
Its very dark, the only light is from the idol.
Double bubble toil and trouble the encAntAtions Are About to peAk!
There's a Clap of Thunder and then suddenly the stone statue begins to crack. I may be in trouble now, there's someone in the room with me!
You've been turned into a broomstick and a witch rides off on you!
...wave the stick and hold the lamp and don't forget to yell 'CHANT'! Oh yes, to help it succeed, a doll you'll need...
Welcome to ADVENTURE:4, 'VOODOO CASTLE' by Alexis ADAMS. Dedicated to all MOMS!
It appears stuck to the floor!
There's no room in there for me!
Some dust fell off it and it glowed briefly.
Medium appears, says: 'Keep a good luck charm on you and your friend. I also see a -moving- bag helping you through a tight squeeze!'
It will take some strong magic to get me through that!
Knife made no impression on it!

Item.Text: Massive stone door with a SAPPHIRE set into it
Wood boards nailed to chimney wall
